title: Odallus: The Dark Call (2015) PC - GOG
description:
Year: July 15, 2015
Genre: Arcade (Platformer)
Developer: JoyMasher
Publisher: JoyMasher
Platform: PC
Version: 1.0.4
Publication Type: License [GOG]
Language: English / Russian / Brazilian, Portuguese
Language: None / not required
License: Freeware

System requirements:
Operating System: Windows XP / Vista / 7/8
Processor: 2.1 GHz
RAM: 2 GB
Video: 256 MB
Hard disk space: 100 MB

Description:
Odallus: The Dark Call - beautiful arcade platformer. You will return at a time when on the platform NES was popular genre Metroidvania. The game is made in the best traditions of Ghosts' n Goblins, Demon's Crest and Castlevania, so you can easily confuse it with one of them. The name of the game is to talk about the many fans of retro. In fact, Odallus: The Dark Call aims to recreate the classic game atmosphere of those times. Graphics are strictly maintained in an 8-bit style perfectly combined with modern design. Odallus: The Dark Call - a kind of compromise between the old and practicality.

Features:
- Eight levels of public
- Huge bosses
- Management Controller
- 8-bit graphics
- Exciting atmosphere
- 4 or more hours of gameplay
- 50 types of enemies

Also in the hand:
- Manual
- Wallpaper
- Avatar
- Poster
